title: The Story of locomotive haulage in the present age
creator_credit: Big Six Film Unit and Edward Cook
brief_description: The story of the Huwood Hudswell diesel mine locomotive. Shows various features, its uses of special man-riding cars for speedy transport of miners to coal face; effect of new transport system; speedier output, larger loads and increased coal production.
